snippet: In a bitter primary, Bill Pascrell defeated Steve Rothman, a fellow congressman and former friend who moved into Mr. Pascrell’s district.
abstract: Rep Bill Pascrell Jr defeats fellow incumbent Rep Steve Rothman in bitter Democratic primary race for the Ninth Congressional District in northern New Jersey; fellow Democrats were pitted against each other after redistricting moved Rothman's home into the state's Fifth District, which has favored Republicans, and he opted to move into Pascrell's heavily Democratic district and run against him.
lead_paragraph: In a bitter primary, Bill Pascrell defeated Steve Rothman, a fellow congressman and former friend who moved into Mr. Pascrell’s district.

headline.seo: Bill Pascrell Defeats Steve Rothman in New Jersey
headline.main: Pascrell Wins Duel of House Democrats in New Jersey
headline.print_headline: Democrat Who Moved Loses New Jersey House Primary
